item.title: Python
item.description: This semester I learned how to use python! One important difference between R studio and python I learned is that indexing in python begins at 0 instead of 1, so it is important to adjust accordingly. For example, if we wanted to find the 4th object in the dataset, we would code like this: list1=[1,2,3,4] list1[3] ## 4 In addition to learning how python varies from R, I learned how R and Python talk to each other and share information.
